title: South, East Asian trading cities, Muslim merchants

content.prompt: Based on the maps and your knowledge of world history, which of the following could be best inferred about the South and East Asian trading cities on the map?

choices.label: They were under the direct political control of Oman.
They were primarily sources of slave labor for the Omanis.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
